part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dust powders the puzzling device.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dust powders the gigantic device.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Light gleams off the edging of a small curio.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tubes of unknown purpose splay at welded joints.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A sitting object of vacant intent catches dust and offlight.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Knobs and rivets crisscross the inscrutable machine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A strange substance fills a channel of glass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An unknown organ bleats with the desperation of life.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An unfamiliar tendril of green in leaf-sheath circles itself.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blemishes cross the short barrel of an unidentified gun.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blemishes cross the long barrel of an unidentified gun.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Smokescar blackens the iron sight and stretches down the big gun's main channel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Stretch wire connects the nocks of an unidentified bow.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cannister of blast is sheathed in undeciphered metal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hunk of fused material makes a beating stick.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A sharp edge tops a strange hilt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A blade of considerable length runs through a strange hilt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bladed edge hangs over a finger-smudged haft.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A curved screen of bang-hard surface material is wielded by a welded grip.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A shaped cuirass of unknown origin protects the good portion of a body.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A head topper was fashioned for unknown purpose.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A false face was shaped to fashion and stitched with unknown intent.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rounded seers are held by a strap.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Strange mitts will fit most wrists and fingers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A rounded torc gleams for unintended eyes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Fabric of some type was sutured to an unknown end.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A strapped sack was sewn for carrying something.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blemishes of long use cross the surface of the footwear.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's a vessel of well and unusual make.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bits sleep until animated inside their rectangle coffin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The array of strange parts are summed together as a kind of tool.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Empty air pressurizes a channel of glass.
